```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)

gapminder %>%
  summarize(medianLifeExp = median(lifeExp))

gapminder %>%
  filter(year == 1957) %>%
  summarize(medianLifeExp = median(lifeExp))

gapminder %>%
  filter(year == 1957) %>%
  summarize(medianLifeExp = median(lifeExp), max(gdpPercap))
```
